Public Member Functions

dropsend::data::dao::IUserRelatedDAO< T > Interface Template Reference

Interface for objects(data model classes) which related to user. Some data model objects like SentFile, Account etc. are related to User. For their reception it is possible to use a method in which parameter is user ID. Inherited from IEntityDAO. More...

#include <iuserrelateddao.h>

virtual QList< T * > getByUserId (int id) const =0
 Gets model's instance by user's ID.

Detailed Description

template<class T>
interface dropsend::data::dao::IUserRelatedDAO< T >

Interface for objects(data model classes) which related to user. Some data model objects like SentFile, Account etc. are related to User. For their reception it is possible to use a method in which parameter is user ID. Inherited from IEntityDAO.

See also:
dropsend::data::dao::IEntityDAO

Member Function Documentation

template<class T>
virtual QList<T*> dropsend::data::dao::IUserRelatedDAO< T >::getByUserId ( int  id  )  const [pure virtual]

Gets model's instance by user's ID.

Returns:
List containing pointers to user's objects.

Implemented in dropsend::data::dao::remoteserver::RemoteServerReceivedFileDAO, and dropsend::data::dao::remoteserver::RemoteServerSentFileDAO.
